data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Charente who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Charente, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 363,900 citizens of the the county of Charente.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary: On average, 23 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Charente, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Charente, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Charente, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Iu Mien people might believe through him.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Charente unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Charente.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, the the county of Charente will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

location.name: Charente
location.cities_list: Angoulême, Cognac, Soyaux, Ruelle-sur-Touvre, La Couronne
location.cities_list_w_pop: Angoulême (49,468), Cognac (20,868), Soyaux (11,220), Ruelle-sur-Touvre (7,597), La Couronne (7,590)
